languages.text: "Мне неугоден ваш тон, Эдельтрад. Потрудитесь изменить манеру, в которой вы говорите со мной — или пожалеете".

traits.locale_text: "Мне неугоден ваш тон, Эдельтрад. Потрудитесь изменить манеру, в которой вы говорите со мной — или пожалеете".

languages.text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."
languages.original_text: "Мне неугоден ваш тон, Эдельтрад. Потрудитесь изменить манеру, в которой вы говорите со мной — или пожалеете".

traits.locale_text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly change the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."
"I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly change the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."
"I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."
"I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."
"I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."

languages.text: “我认为你的语气很不友好，艾德萨德。我需要你改变称呼我的方式，否则，接下来的事情恐怕会令你懊悔不已。”
languages.original_text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."

traits.locale_text: “我认为你的语气很不友好，艾德萨德。我需要你改变称呼我的方式，否则，接下来的事情恐怕会令你懊悔不已。”

languages.text: «Su tono me resulta desagradable, Edelthrad. Haga el favor de dirigirse a mí de otra manera, o le aseguro que vivirá para lamentar las consecuencias».
languages.original_text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."

traits.locale_text: «Su tono me resulta desagradable, Edelthrad. Haga el favor de dirigirse a mí de otra manera, o le aseguro que vivirá para lamentar las consecuencias».

languages.text: 「あなたの口調は不適切だ、エデルスラド。言葉遣いに気をつけること。さもなければ、あなたは後悔するでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの口調は何よりも不快だ、エデルスラド。私への話し方を変えてください。さもなければ、あなたはその結果を後悔しながら生き続けるでしょう」
「あなたの口調は不適切だ、エデルスラド。言葉遣いに気をつけること。さもなければ、あなたは後悔するでしょう」

languages.text: « Votre ton est particulièrement désagréable, Edelthrad. Je vous saurais gré de bien vouloir modifier votre façon de m'adresser la parole, sous peine d'en subir les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."

traits.locale_text: « Votre ton est particulièrement désagréable, Edelthrad. Je vous saurais gré de bien vouloir modifier votre façon de m'adresser la parole, sous peine d'en subir les conséquences. »

languages.text: "Euer Ton gefällt mir ganz und gar nicht, Edelthrad. Ihr werdet so gut sein und mich angemessen ansprechen, sonst müsst Ihr die Konsequenzen tragen."
languages.original_text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Ton gefällt mir ganz und gar nicht, Edelthrad. Ihr werdet so gut sein und mich angemessen ansprechen, sonst müsst Ihr die Konsequenzen tragen."

languages.text: "Sesinin tonundan hiç hoşlanmadım Edelthrad. Bana hitap şeklini değiştirmeni rica ediyorum, yoksa sonuçlarına pişman olursun."
languages.original_text: "I find your tone most disagreeable, Edelthrad. You will kindly alter the manner in which you address me, or else you will live to regret the consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Sesinin tonundan hiç hoşlanmadım Edelthrad. Bana hitap şeklini değiştirmeni rica ediyorum, yoksa sonuçlarına pişman olursun."
